item.Q:
Write the character:
content; calm; still; quiet; to pacify; peace; surname
item.A:
ān
安全 ānquán safe; secure; safety; security

item.Q:
Write the character:
Chinese monetary unit; dollar; primary; first; the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368 AD); surname
item.A:
yuán
元素 yuánsù element; element of a set; chemical element

item.Q:
Write the character:
surname; ten thousand; a great number
item.A:
traditional: 萬
wàn
十万 (十萬) shíwàn hundred thousand

item.Q:
Write the character:
to ally; to unite; to join
item.A:
traditional: 聯
lián
苏联 (蘇聯) Sūlián Soviet Union

item.Q:
Write the character:
coin; money; surname
item.A:
traditional: 錢
qián
金钱 (金錢) jīnqián money; currency

item.Q:
Write the character:
remove; do away with; wipe out; divide; except
item.A:
chú
除了 chúle besides; apart from (... also...); in addition to; except (for)

item.Q:
Write the character:
begin
item.A:
shǐ
开始 (開始) kāishǐ begin; beginning; start; initial

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: fake; false; artificial; to borrow; if; suppose
2: vacation
item.A:
1: jǐa 2: jìa
假定 jǐadìng to assume; to suppose 请假 (請假) qǐngjìa ask for time off

item.Q:
Write the character:
night
item.A:
yè
昼夜 (晝夜) zhòuyè day and night; period of 24 hours; continuously, without stop

item.Q:
Write the character:
heat; to heat up; fervent; hot (of weather); warm up
item.A:
热 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 熱
rè
加热 (加熱) jīarè heating

item.Q:
Write the character:
end; finish
item.A:
终 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 終
zhōng
始终 (始終) shǐzhōng from beginning to end; all along

item.Q:
Write the character:
to deliver; to carry; to give (as a present); to present (with); to see off; to send
item.A:
sòng
输送 (輸送) shūsòng transport; carry

item.Q:
Write the character:
positive (electric.); sun; male principle (Taoism); Yang, opposite of 陰|阴 yin1 ☯
item.A:
阳 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 陽
yáng
阳光 (陽光) yángguāng sunshine

item.Q:
Write the character:
to practice; to study; habit
item.A:
traditional: 習
xí
学习 (學習) xuéxí to learn; to study

item.Q:
Write the character:
to obey; to follow; to arrange; to make reasonable; along; favorable
item.A:
顺 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 順
shùn
顺序 (順序) shùnxù sequence; order

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to press; to push down; to keep under (control)
2: in the first place; to crush
item.A:
traditional: 壓
1: yā 2: yà
压力 (壓力) yālì pressure 低气压 (低氣壓) dīqìyà low pressure area

item.Q:
Write the character:
to welcome
item.A:
yíng
欢迎 (歡迎) huānyíng to welcome; welcome

item.Q:
Write the character:
to dance; to wield; to brandish
item.A:
wǔ
鼓舞 gǔwǔ heartening (news); boost (morale)

item.Q:
Write the character:
spring (time); gay; joyful; youthful; love; lust; life
item.A:
chūn
春秋 chūnqiū spring and autumn; four seasons; the year; a person's age; Spring and Autumn period (770-476 BC), with many states contending for hegemony; Spring and Autumn Annals, one of the Confucian Five Classics 五經|五经; used in book titles
